items.title: 1. Introduction to Prompt Engineering
items.description: Why prompt engineering matters, core concepts, evolution, and what you'll learn in 2025

items.title: 2 Anatomy of a Prompt
items.description: Understanding the five core components and proven frameworks for effective prompts

items.title: 3 Core Reasoning Patterns
items.description: Master Zero-shot, Few-shot, CoT, ReAct, Tree of Thoughts, Self-Consistency, and when to use each

items.title: 4 Structured Output Engineering
items.description: Master JSON Mode, XML tagging, schema enforcement, and provider-specific techniques for production-grade LLM outputs

items.title: 5 Spring AI Prompts
items.description: Spring AI Prompt API: ChatClient, PromptTemplate, Message types, and prompt engineering patterns for enterprise applications

items.title: 6 Evaluation & Version Control
items.description: Measuring prompt quality, A/B testing, metrics frameworks, and managing prompts in production

items.title: 7 Advanced Techniques
items.description: Self-critique, iterative refinement, meta-prompting, multi-turn reasoning, and cutting-edge prompt engineering methods

items.title: 8 Multi-modal Prompting
items.description: Vision-text prompting, document understanding, video analysis, and cross-modal reasoning with GPT-4V, Claude, and Gemini

items.title: 9 Agent Orchestration
items.description: Comprehensive guide to multi-agent systems: hierarchical, parallel, debate, and advanced orchestration patterns with Spring AI
